website_summaries.verdict: Motorola puts feature phones on notice with the affordable, unlocked Moto E, making a modern Android smartphone experience more accessible than ever.
pros: Great build quality and display for the price

customer_reviews.title: excellent budget phone for emergency/backup/overseas trip
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap choice for over seas/vacation trips(most countries are GSM),or someone on a budget and never used a smart phone before. Plus its a slick looking phone for $119. Out of the box a 74mb update took only less than 5 min to download and install. The one I bought came with 4gb memory,so a MicroSD is a must in case you take a lot of pix(cheap 16GB for $10 will do it) The camera too nice pix outside ,but I didn't test the can indoor (no flash built-in,I read many coplaints about the bad pix quality in doors or nights). .. I will update my review later after coming back from mediterranean trip.
customer_reviews.author: MJ28

customer_reviews.title: not a good fit for us
customer_reviews.text: My mother found it too hard to use and i am grateful we were able to return it. Screen was hard to press and the controls (like answering a phone call) were not intuitive. Not a good fit for a 75 year old grandma.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap phone I purchased while I awaited a replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap phone I purchased while I awaited a replacement touch screen for my nexus. Only maddening issue is the MMS is really screwy with the motorola, which is not the case in other android phones I've used. I couldn't get it to work, images would appear sent, but recipient would never receive photo/video sent in this manner. I downloaded alternate sms apps, still didn't work, finally increased the picture limit to 300ish and it sends photo/video....for now.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: This is not the one
customer_reviews.text: This phone is nice but the camera is terrible. I use my phone to take pictures of business cards. When I take a picture of a business card with this phone you can't read the information. The picture is blurred. It does not focus. I had a Samsung prior to this one pretty inexpensive phone but the camera was much better. The other reason for my return is the phone keeps cutting off. While in the middle of a conversation it will just shut down with a FULL charge. To much trouble for a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not good phone
customer_reviews.text: it was good looking on the website but not that good when I got, Camera terrible, cover lose and not properly fitting. It was waste of money, I would have felt better should I donated the money I used to buy this phone to other non-profit agency or help someone with it. the phone is not worth $127 plus. In my opinion as someone who has bought it, the phone cost would have been less than$60. My review is just about phone's over all quality and not about brand or amazon website.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel D.Ajang

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the functions I need.
customer_reviews.text: I live in China and needed an unlocked GSM smartphone for cellular domestic calls, for 3G/4G service and wifi. This phone will not be used for games or watching videos so the slightly smaller (than my MotoX) display doesn't present any issues. I don't anticipate I will need a rear-facing camera as I have other devices for video calls. The back cover is a little flimsy, but a standard case protects and holds it in place. I like the Motorola and Google-provided apps (Motorola Assist and Google Now) for searching, scheduling, driving, sleeping. Frankly, I didn't envision that I could get a new unlocked GSM smartphone with all this functionality at this price point so I'm quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sung

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this little phone. Used it for travel. Called back to the US wherever I was from with no problems whatsoever. Good features for a great little phone. Only concern is I wish it had a front facing camera as well.
customer_reviews.author: dewit1200

customer_reviews.title: Moto E nice phone
customer_reviews.text: First Android phone. Coming from an iPhone 4. I will not miss iTunes. Highly responsive & easy to use. Only ding is for no camera led flash for use as flashlight. I was always a google, gmail user, set-up was easy. Moto transfer of iCloud was easy. What took me so long?! I really wanted the Moto G 4g LTE version, but budget was the determining factor. I was able to purchase Moto E, Tudia slim case & Micro SD Card for $160. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tom K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Buy it to be used in Venezuela, been 2 days with it, and so far so good, it's just a little thicker that i liked to be, but it's flowy, pics aren't amazing beacuse the 5mp camera (no flah and no front facing camera included), but they are really good with good lightning, nice color, stilish look, beautiful colors. My mom likes it, and as she is not a heavy use, it just great for her, but it worked good for a regular use (i used it for a month and i went really good)
customer_reviews.author: Kery

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the computer to phone USB charging cord??
customer_reviews.text: Just today got this new phone up and running. This is my first so-called 'smartphone' so for now I can only comment on the purchase alone till I have more time to put it through it's paces. Could not beat the price as I had a few gift cards to use up. My only complaint at this point is that I did now receive that USB charge cord that was advertised with this phone. I'm sure I'll be having a few words with Amazon about that later.
customer_reviews.author: RMTC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic device for the money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic device for the money. Using it with AT&T Go Phone account and never been happier. Long day battery life, clean android interface, no weird bloatware uselessness. I chose this one for it's small size because I have to text frequently while walking and this fits nicely in hands and with Swype you can text solidly with your thumb keeping you other hand free.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: My only gripe is that the storage space is so ...
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is that the storage space is so small that I can't even download the software updates. I have nothing on the phone yet, but the next Android update can't download. Oh well, all I use it for is games and Chromecast casting anyways.
customer_reviews.author: AStudstill

customer_reviews.title: Budget Booster!
customer_reviews.text: Update --- Buy a model with more memory -- an Android update wiped mine out, rendering the phone basically useless. This little gem does everything anyone NEEDS a phone to do, and has truly astonishing battery life (I've been charging it every third day). I can't imagine why anyone pays the inflated costs of the Contract Plans to get a "free" phone. Silly, really!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Love whatever Motorola Moto E Amazon sent me
customer_reviews.text: Even though I ordered the Motorola Moto E (2nd Generation), if I received the 1st Generation, I still love the phone. It provides me access to everything I need. The fact that I received a 1st Generation, rather than a 2nd, explains why the case I ordered does not fit. I would suggest that if you purchase this hone you make sure you geta case that will fit.
customer_reviews.author: marlene connor

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone; but mine was locked
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this phone. Light weight, perfect for light - moderate use like phone, text, check mail, pandora and gps. I don't get too fancy so this suited my needs perfectly. Unfortunately, when I took it to the ATT store for a new sim card, they told me it was locked and I couldn't use data. It was supposed to be UNLOCKED so I had to return it to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: bb148

customer_reviews.title: Very good cell phone.  Muy buen teléfono celular.
customer_reviews.text: Very good cell phone. Easy to set up. The manufacturer installed a few custom applications but all very useful. Very good coverage. Fast. Updated with the latest in Android. Very highly recommended. Muy buen teléfono celular. Fácil de configurar. El fabricante instala unas pocas aplicaciones personalizadas pero todas ellas muy útiles. Muy buena cobertura. Rápido. Actualizado con lo último en Android. Muy muy recomendado.
customer_reviews.author: Miguelito

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend bought me this phone to replace my iPhone 4. Much bigger screen than the iPhone 4, graphics are great for Crushing Candy and it feels nice in your hands. Love the Gorilla Glass! Best phone for the money. Very happy.. Thinking about ordering more as gifts for my step son and others. Pretty screen, no bloatware... that's all I can think of at the moment!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchmen

customer_reviews.title: but 8GB is just not enough memory for the minor additional applications they'd like to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these more than a year ago for my wife and daughter. They work and are reliable, but 8GB is just not enough memory for the minor additional applications they'd like to install.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Dave

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a while, but after 4 months it stopped seeing the SIM card, even after I tried to clean the slot with alcohol. That SIM had been working fine, and it still works in another phone -- so it's time to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: msk

customer_reviews.title: Great phone especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone especially for the price. I bought this for a relative on my travels to Africa and it worked really well. I believe the charger is able to take up to 220v so the only thing you need is an adapter in order to fit it in the international outlets. It's a basic smart phone with all the bells and whistles of the high end ones.
customer_reviews.author: arslfan

customer_reviews.title: Finally a usable Android phone for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: After going to all operators in Seattle downtown looking for a Smartphone running Android for a good price, I found nothing. This new Moto E I found online is really good and for an excellent price! For the first time I can recommend getting something other than iPhone. iPhones are just too expensive. Previous versions of Android have been painful to use, but it keeps getting better with every release. This Motorola works really fast, it's unlocked to any operator (SIM card not included), and it is running the latest version of Android and the screen resolution is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Travel Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone because I didn't want to bring my S4 with all my personal info when traveling abroad. This phone is really cheap and performs very quickly. It can accept a SIM card, domestic or international as well as a mini-SD card to expand its otherwise anemic storage. I am truly impressed with this cheap, yet powerful, phone.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't open the phone to get the sim card ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't open the phone to get the sim card in. Have NO idea where it would go. I sent the phone back unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUY BUENO...... VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I bought Two last June 2014 as a gifts For My dad and older sister in Venezuela, they just bought chips and started to use right away, My sister last week puts another chips For our vacation in Panamá without any problem they love it even they know liitle about apps and internet is easy and working very well ; This year i decided to Buy another Two to My younger sister and My son , since I know they will love it and use it a lot, even From Facebook messenger we make free calls for Hours From This Phone ... I have IPhone But This Motorola do some tasks For much less money ; definitely I RECOMMENDED 100%
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered, unimpressive phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to play Ingress because I was told the GPS was really impressive. It isn't, and worse, the phone isn't really powerful enough to play Ingress. It serves its purpose as a locked down phone for ops in low data areas, but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy, phone runs smoothly and updates like a ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing buy, phone runs smoothly and updates like a charm, not 4GLTE yet runs comparably fast. Tested with several different provider's sims and functioned perfectly. Small size, definitely recommended as a replacemnent or simple smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life & screen quality. Totally worth the moolah
customer_reviews.author: Sricharan Madadi

customer_reviews.title: Piece of JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: bought one of these for my wife, after six months she can no longer send or receive photos with texts. As far as I am concerned it is a total piece of junk, and waste of my money!
customer_reviews.author: R.K. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: great phone for the cash
customer_reviews.text: good basic phone does a lot lacks some features in settings to make things easier but all in all great substitute for the big buck phones. With service provided by At&t never have lost a call and everything works fast and pictures are good but steady eddy required .
customer_reviews.author: naftaman

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, spending less
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the Moto G cellphones. But this ones is a rellay good option for those people who doesn't need a really powerful smarthphone and they don't want to spend too much money. Although is has a low price but you will get a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Osman M.

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level Smart phone
customer_reviews.text: As a low cost smartphone you can't go wrong with this device, since it a Motorola you will get the latest OS updates fairly quickly and the battery last all day. Good battery lift. bought it for my daughter and she is very happy with the phone. Good build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dale M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price and best quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was refurbished product and it's just like brand new. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul patel

customer_reviews.title: So I purchase this one just because it looks nice and has a good price and my wife is ...
customer_reviews.text: my wife had this old Mini phone and it was locking up, not turning on. So I purchase this one just because it looks nice and has a good price and my wife is not a fun of complicated phones. She love the product
customer_reviews.author: Oscar A. Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Good product, except for camera
customer_reviews.text: Good product for its price. But if you are looking for a mobile with a good camera, you may want to look elsewhere. The rear camera is of decent resolution, but the images and videos can sometimes be choppy. Selfie junkies, this is definitely not for you.
customer_reviews.author: aruna

customer_reviews.title: Global phone for a very local price
customer_reviews.text: Great international phone. Sent over to my family in Australia, works a treat. Very good for the price if you are looking for a basic 'smart' phone. Runs apps smoothly, nice feel, finish and bright screen. Very average camera, adequate batter life. Perfect size and weight. No need to spend on Moto G in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Watchman

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, but Motorola has done a poor job ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, but Motorola has done a poor job managing the updates and its almost bricked at this point because the operating system takes up 90% of internal memory.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B.

customer_reviews.title: Best budget smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Probably the best budget smartphone. Nice, clean shaped, awesome quality material. Almost pure Android, no bloatware. Awesome screen quality and angle views. Cons: no front face camera, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Yanes Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Good performance for money, but NO LOLLIPOP!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone gave me so much gray hair with the awful KitKat OS. If it gets lollipop maybe it will be usable. And when Google releases another OS, it'll probably be another year before you see it on this phone :(
customer_reviews.author: Prince Hal

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist but well built smartphone at inconceivable value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my dad's first smartphone. People who want more than basic functions should consider the Moto G instead, which among other advantages has a much better screen. It's amazing that a decent smartphone can go for less than $150 now.
customer_reviews.author: sonnojoi

customer_reviews.title: Good battery. Got the latest kitkat update as soon ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Good battery. Got the latest kitkat update as soon as it powered on. New ART execution env works. Unlocked. Amazon warehouse like new quality. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: A great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great phone for the price. The case was difficult to open for a 60-year-old, but my 25-year-old niece had not problem. I was also worried that 4 gb might not be enough room for maps of several countries, but no problem at all
customer_reviews.author: Dr_Feelgood

customer_reviews.title: Very nice phone.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far. Only activated it one week ago. Still figuring out all the new options since this is my first smart phone. Easy to use, compact, very attractive with the white fold type case which I ordered separately. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: annie l banks

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone for the price. Actually, this is my wife's phone and I have the Moto G. The phone is responsive, good clear display, and has the latest Android.
customer_reviews.author: wrj

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made simple smartphone, fast and powerful enough for simple use. Planning to purchase Moto G (3rd Gen) or Moto X based on the good experience with Moto E.
customer_reviews.author: The Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price (late review but this is in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price (late review but this is in use since some time now so I guess that kinda makes sense)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, excellent product at a great cost
customer_reviews.text: The cost-quality relationship could not be better, the phone has all the necessary functions, is of a good size in my opinion, neither so large nor so small, handles all applications fast way, it's a great team, the only inconvenience that might present is the size of the meroria, but nothing that can not be settled with a removable memory which are also much lower cost, I recommend 100%.
customer_reviews.author: MANUEL JOSE CASTAÑEDA MARCANO

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this phone!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my girlfriend, she loved it, I loved it... Just ordered one for myself, ABSOLUTELY the best Android phone in this price range! EXCELLENT device.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchmen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this Item a lot, but it was locked, luckily I was able to unlock it easy on Ebay.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: unusable
customer_reviews.text: Not one single instruction in English, nothing. Five other languages though. Plenty of instructions for service in Chile? Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: the speaker got bad with just one month
customer_reviews.text: wouldnt buy again, the speaker got bad with just one month. Buy another cell phone, not this one.
customer_reviews.author: SamuelS

customer_reviews.title: Phone with a built-in (non removable) battery is not acceptable ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone with a built-in (non removable) battery is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Bukovski

customer_reviews.title: the battery life is better than iphone but the ring sound is not loud ...
customer_reviews.text: it is my first andriod phone and will be used when travel, the battery life is better than iphone but the ring sound is not loud enough. based on the price it works ok
customer_reviews.author: Kun Ouyang

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing battery life! Super easy interface for those not computer/phone oriented. Loudness of rings/notifications much better than past Moto phones. And easy to use in US and Europe. So glad Moto made this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little android for low price
customer_reviews.text: Simple and straight forward. Easy to use. Great sound. Great clarity on screen, Great Battery life. Just works well for me. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Step Lively

customer_reviews.title: No autofocus !
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very good. It has everything at this price point, except auto focus. Wish they had included it as well. Since there is no autofocus, forget taking close up snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Got A Dell Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. It works out the box with no problem, people get Amazon Prime the delivery was fast phone came in two days from date of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Whyte

customer_reviews.title: He didn't need anything too fancy and this was a nice starter smart phone for him
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for Christmas for my husband. He didn't need anything too fancy and this was a nice starter smart phone for him.
customer_reviews.author: DianeS9

customer_reviews.title: He loves his Motorola Moto E.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Motorola phone. He says that it is easy to use to talk and play games. He has told several friends at school that this is the phone to get.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this with Straight Talk, awesome phone for the price. Was a huge upgrade from my old Samsung Galaxy Precedent. Highly recommend buying a case to go with it. The first day I had it and dropped it in a parking lot and chipped the edge of the screen. Micro sim card for those that are wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable phone for the price. Not a speed demon by any means, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Howard C.

customer_reviews.title: Basic smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: Just needed a phone to text with. Cheapest smart phone I could find. Don't use most of its features, so cant tell you if its good or bad.
customer_reviews.author: AYF

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok unlocked phone but Android Auto does not work with it
customer_reviews.author: Arabic Autodidact

customer_reviews.title: Great cheapness
customer_reviews.text: While having some difficulties because 4GB is not much sometimes this is the best phone you can get for 130$, is simply too cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & very good android phone
customer_reviews.text: Affordable & very good android phone. But one catch: didn't realize that this is the 1st generation of MotoE, and it doesn't have front camera. So no selfie with this phone. But it's still a good phone
customer_reviews.author: Priharum Marlina

customer_reviews.title: MOTO E
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone a couple of weeks ago because I didn't need a smartphone with all the bells and whistles that normally accompany it. I am completely satisfied. It does everything I need it to and that's what matters. I was nervous because of the low price, but once turning it on and setting it up I knew it would be perfect for what I needed. It's nice not to get ripped off on the price of a cell phone!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone
customer_reviews.text: Its a great little phone - feels very solid and premium in hand. If you are not too much into great camera or very high end apps - this is perfect for a phone. I am using an Indian SIM in it - and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Shubhadip G.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price, but the limited amount of memory quickly becomes an issue, for any kind of use really. I would advice getting the Motorola Moto G instead, in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Moto E
customer_reviews.text: Had to charge out of the box but whatever no big deal...the charger that came with it may be faulty because it wouldn't charge the phone or do anything when I plug it in. I have the one the I have for my Moto G and worked just fine, phone booted right up and works fine! Other than the cheap charger it came with no issues so far, I mean s***, I payed less than $100 bucks so win for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using for wifi home phone. Be careful with sim cards. Takes medium sized sim, not nano..
customer_reviews.author: S. Rosenquist

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use with Straight Talk. Works perfectly. While not the most powerful phone out there, if you are like me all that extra processing power would be wasted after the initial tinkering. Unless you are really into cutting edge 3D gaming on your phone, this little guy will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brown

customer_reviews.title: Incredible phone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed that for the price this thing goes fast and the speaker is really loud!!
customer_reviews.author: Valst

customer_reviews.title: Really great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little phone for the price.....But the only bad part is the 2gb limited internal storage on the phone..
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Diaz

customer_reviews.title: An excellent dead phone.
customer_reviews.text: A little old to buy in 2015 but still a good phone for normal users, if you're interested in games also runs fairly modern games like old but keep in mind that it only has 2GB for applications. Not because the white version of the phone if you can upgrade to lollipop and the black no. just for that I put 3-star the rest is a great phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moto is a excellent phone!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas H. Hale

customer_reviews.title: No SIM card message, need to reboot to get phone back up
customer_reviews.text: Every day I loose my connection and it shows that there is no SIM card in the phone, need to power cycle the phone to get my service and SIM back up and running. Just tried to return it , but missed the 30 day Amazon deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Huber

customer_reviews.title: wonderful phone. It is super cheap so I was ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful phone. It is super cheap so I was expecting a pretty bad device, but it's really good. By far the best 4.3" phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best built cheap phone one can get. Google clean software strongly built
customer_reviews.author: Dolguin

customer_reviews.title: ..high quality of performance.....!!
customer_reviews.text: Is really a phone, with high quality of performance...ideal for those people who like the good and are so full of work; but with a moderate investment...excellent photos and videos...very efficient whatsapp. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE PASOS PALOMINO

customer_reviews.title: Good back up phone.
customer_reviews.text: Good phone as a back up but terrible on storage. If you have a nano SIM card I'll recommend buying a SIM card kit to upgrade it to a micro SIM card because that's what this phone takes.
customer_reviews.author: Delfino Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Very affordable and food phone for a kid/teen
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Best value phone in the market! Great materials, great interface, no problem whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Marquis D´On

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for its price
customer_reviews.text: Advantages: Gorilla glass, fast CPU, perfect screen, stable OS, long-life battery. And the best price/quality ratio. Cons: * small system flash. i have to clear cache before install new software. otherwise i see "not enought memory" error * weak camera. autofocus is not critical. but overall imaging quality is poor
customer_reviews.author: krr

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect entry level phone
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly as described. It's a perfect entry level phone.
customer_reviews.author: The Promise

customer_reviews.title: great price. great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a moto g, this is just a step down from screen size and processing power. Still a great budget phone. I Dont even like to call it a budget phone because it still offers a great pure android experience.
customer_reviews.author: BEN

customer_reviews.title: Opened package with tears that is repacked
customer_reviews.text: Opened package with tears that is repacked. Returning as I wasn't expecting a phone that was not new.
customer_reviews.author: Mohit L.

customer_reviews.title: This works fine except at 90 years old I had a difficulty ...
customer_reviews.text: This works fine except at 90 years old I had a difficulty in learning all of the various menus. It id replacing an alarm system. My kids help me come of age.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Muller

customer_reviews.title: camera resolution
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap phone is fine. Now i have a little problem with the resolution of the camera, so i don't enjoy taking photos... life battery is longer than other phone, also the use you gave it is importan in the battery. but the most important is the camera reloution for been a camera to 5mp is no good.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon A. Cifuentes C

customer_reviews.title: excelent phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is really good, good screen resolution, the touch work fine, sound quality really good. if you can buy Moto G this phone is good to start.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not so bad so far so good I haven't have any complaints as of yet
customer_reviews.author: Cjim Ya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone easy to operate, install sims card and were going, Has all the features i need
customer_reviews.author: ted duchsher

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Phone, I like it.!! It's like a Moto G without flash and less memory rom
customer_reviews.author: E Liberty C Flores

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, affordable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, affordable, runs all the apps I want. The only thing I don't like is that it wants to upload everything to Google servers (back up your phone). Google has way too much information already, so I turned that feature off.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Brown

customer_reviews.title: amazing value. Wont perform like one of the $700 ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent phone, amazing value. Wont perform like one of the $700 flagship phones but at $130 it is amazing functional. The camera is its real draw back.
customer_reviews.author: lefty

customer_reviews.title: Great Android for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone for the price. Bought it for my grandmother and loaded BIG Launcher onto it. Phone is missing some features, but has everything she needs and is very good build quality. Also doesn't come with any of the bloatware found on other Android devices.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kerekes

customer_reviews.title: it's a good phone.
customer_reviews.text: Had been used for about two/three years now, sadly it just dead recently. But overall, it's a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Thorn

customer_reviews.title: Really love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Works great, price was right and it is just as good as my iphone! I was really worried that the phone would be crappy but it's really great, easy to use and a really nice style, it needs charging often, about once every two days but I am fine with that.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good for basic use
customer_reviews.text: Good for basic use! I bought it for my daughter. You should pay SD card to extand the memory and have more apps, it comes only with 4GB.
customer_reviews.author: KSA

customer_reviews.title: it is okey...
customer_reviews.text: this cons is most noticeable for me: 1. back panel is horrible, after removing and put it on phone again, it slides little and it is very annoying... 2. also lock and volume buttons is strange, kinda not clicking but clicked and revers..just second annoying thing... as owner of Moto G I can tell that Moto E is not as good as it should, but it steel best Price vs Performance
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Storage Space, Terrible Camera
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of apps or photos or anything on my phone, yet it's constantly telling me that I don't have enough storage space. It's always telling me I need to make updates, yet I am unable to, because there is not enough storage for the updates. Also, the camera is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: can hardly tell the difference with the moto G. It works as a very basic stable phone. Strongly recommended if you are not a heavy user of apps
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Peña

product_meta.title: Motorola Moto E (1st Generation) - Black - 4 GB - Global GSM Unlocked Phone
product_meta.description: Style:Global GSM| Color:BlackBuilt to last The sharpest display in its class. Protected with Corning® Gorilla® Glass and a water-resistant splash guard. Don't let the fear of everyday scratches and splashes stand in your way. Power to last With a long-lasting 1980 mAh battery you can go all day without plugging in. Software to last Moto E runs AndroidTM 4.4, KitKat®, the latest version of the world's most popular mobile platform. And with a guaranteed upgrade, you'll be up to date with the best Android experience.
feature_bullets: Compatibility- All GSM Networks including AT&T and (2G) T-Mobile
Optimized to work with 3G (UMTS/HSPA+) networks when roaming outside the US. Only supports 2G coverage on T-Mobile.
Protected with Corning Gorilla Glass and a water-resistant splash guard for lasting durability.
A long-lasting battery (this device ships with a USB charger only; no wall plug included). Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion, 1980mAh battery.
Switch out your Motorola Shells. With its curved design, Moto E fits comfortably in your hand and nicely in your pocket.

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.
